org.tantalum.j2me

Class J2MEPlatformUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tantalum.PlatformUtils
      • org.tantalum.j2me.J2MEPlatformUtils

  • public final class J2MEPlatformUtils
extends PlatformUtils
    Utilities for support of each specific platform (J2ME, Android, ..) The platform-specific local copy of this class replaces this base version for other platforms.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  J2MEPlatformUtils.J2MEHttpConn
      A convenience class abstracting HTTP connection operations between different platforms

    • Constructor Detail

      • J2MEPlatformUtils

        public J2MEPlatformUtils()
        Create a new instance of the J2ME platform port helper class. This is created for you when your MIDlet extends AndroidMIDlet and calls the super() constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • doRunOnUiThread

        protected void doRunOnUiThread(java.lang.Runnable action)
        Add an object to be executed in the foreground on the event dispatch thread. All popular JavaME applications require UI and input events to be called serially only from this one thread. Note that if you queue too many object on the EDT you risk out of memory and (more commonly) a temporarily unresponsive user interface.
        Specified by:
        doRunOnUiThread in class PlatformUtils
        Parameters:
        action -

      • doNotifyDestroyed

        protected void doNotifyDestroyed()
        The application calls this when all Workers have completed shutdown to inform the phone that the program has closed itself. Do not call this directly, call Worker.shutdown() to initiate a close
        Specified by:
        doNotifyDestroyed in class PlatformUtils
